messages.subject: Re: Interesting Seasonal  Ritual-----OH--Kmart---UNDIES-...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/30/99 6:32:58 PM Eastern Standard Time, swoodall@bluecrab.org writes:  ... It is now 2:10am
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/30/99 6:32:58 PM Eastern Standard Time,
swoodall@... writes:

<< om: sara woodall <swoodall@...>

> My kids are sometimes up until 2 AM
> AM I alone! >>

It is now 2:10am here and I can hear doors opening and shutting and timers on
the stove going off. Last night dh was just drifting off to sleep when 16yro
went in and showered in our shower, which woke dh up. (They have their own
bath.) Not to mention that each of the older boys came in the other night and
opened the broken fridge door..thump. Even with signs on it.
I shouldn't'be up but I am just able to get on the computer.17yro thought
he'd change the background or something on my screen and the picture had been
rolling since yesterday. We just fixed it.
This has been a really rough week so far and it's only Wed.

Laura
